FAQ


Questions to Ask When Choosing an Atlanta Moving Company

We know you want to hire the best movers in Atlanta, and we strongly believe we are that company. Our recommendations and reviews speak for themselves. However, we believe that the best decision is an informed decision. To help you prepare for your move, here are some questions which we feel are essential to choosing a moving company in Atlanta, as well as our responses.

If you have a question or concern that isnâ€™t addressed below, or you would like to learn more about our services, please call us today at 678-225-8938.

Are you a licensed and insured moving company?

Yes. Above Average Movers is licensed by the Georgia Department of Motor Vehicles Safety for Household Moving within the state of Georgia and we carry the required insurance coverage. Above Average Movers also has Federal I.C.C. authority for all 48 states. Call and check any moving company in Atlanta at the Georgia Department of Motor Vehicle Safety at 678-413-8575.

Are your movers full-time employees?

Yes. All employees are full-time, professional Atlanta movers. All employees are drug tested and undergo background and reference checks. Our employees are some of the highest paid movers in Atlanta and also receive a benefits package.

What forms of payment do you accept?

In order to make it convenient and easy for you, we accept MasterCard, Visa, American Express, certified checks, cash, Venmo, Zelle, Cash App and money orders. We do not accept personal checks. Our corporate clients can arrange to have a corporate account established, in which case we bill your company directly.

Do you shrink wrap and pad furniture?

Yes. We completely shrink wrap and pad ALL furniture items prior to moving them, greatly reducing risk of damages, at no additional charge.

Do you offer replacement coverage?

Yes. Replacement coverage is offered. Please ask your Sales professional for details.

How many moves did Above Average Movers do last year?

Above Average Movers handled approximately 400 moves last year.

If you have any additional questions about our moving services, please feel free to call us at 678-225-8938 .
